altTitles.ja: 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる

altTitles.zh: 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦

description.en:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
description.ja:
人気絶頂を誇ったゲームでもその寿命は限られている。実に15年もの歳月を一つのゲームにぶち込んだガチ勢・「淀水アムロ」は、ゲーム内で人生を賭けた一世一代の大博打に挑戦するがあえなく失敗。全てを失い気を失ったアムロが目覚めた所は、リリース初期の15年前だった。回帰前と同じ轍は踏まないと誓うアムロ。全てを知り尽くしたソシャゲ廃人は、最強のニュービーとして蘇る！

---

오직 나만이 엔딩을 알고 있다.

'나는 고인물이다'

description.ru:
До конца игры 15 лет. И только мне известно, как всё произойдет. – Я мертвая вода!

---

description.zh:
沉浸在虚拟游戏中的35岁宅男李煜阳不仅众叛亲离、借贷负债，还在游戏中赌输了唯一能还债的机会，在他绝望之际竟然阴差阳错穿越回了15年前，此时游戏还只是测试版，一切才刚刚开始，借此机会李煜阳想要改变人生，咸鱼翻身，踏上致富之路……凭借着十几年的经验与记忆，他脱下盔甲和内裤，决心站在游戏之巅，单纯地享受这一切！然而这一次，他会走向怎样的未来呢？

---

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

altTitles.ja: 波のしじまのホリゾント

altTitles.de: In der Stille schauen wir den Horizont

altTitles.en: In Silence, We Look at the Horizon

description.en: Riku is an elementary school boy who loves football. Yori is a high school girl who is the ex-girlfriend of Riku's brother, and she is full of secrets. This is a story of first love that unfolds with the sea breeze, from a pre-adolescent perspective.

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

title.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Detector
I Will Become a Poison Detector in the Dark World
I Will Become a Poison Detector of Darkness

altTitles.zh: 完蛋！成了反派的试毒小跟班

description.en:
I, an innocent office worker, possessed a character in the devastating novel *The Poisoned Apple*. On top of that, I'm Giselle Lloydsvin, a villainess who gets poisoned to death before being hanged! But the poison brought by the assassins doesn't work? It even tastes like fruit!

"You'll be okay since it's only a little bit, so hurry and drink it."

…Even though I possessed someone, it seems my destiny is to be tormented by a crazy assassin. 

However, "Leniel", who I thought was just a crazy assassin, turns out to be the frontman for the final villain, "Wayne Ayore"?!

In order to hold onto this lifeline, I clung to the villain in *The Poisoned Apple*. 

"I can distinguish the taste of poison."

“Poison?”

“Yes.”

“What use is that?”

“Your boss is going to be poisoned, so I can be his poison taster.”

And so, I thought I could survive well as a general store employee of the villain’s frontman(?)... 

“My boss is so strong to the point that there’s something suspicious about him!”

…Why does it feel like I’m doomed in this life too?

altTitles.ja: ストロベリーパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
Cover: Hanekoto  
Illustration: Yuama

altTitles.ja: 303号室の神さま
神様です。サービスするよ
神様と陰気な少年

altTitles.en: I'm a God. I'll serve you.

altTitles.vi: Tôi là một vị thần. Tôi sẽ giúp bạn
Thần và cậu bé u ám

title.en: Philia Rose - The Prophecy of the Crown of Thorns

description.en:
Stop the rebellion of the Priest and Prince Paeryun!
Philia, a priestess who has the ability to read the other person's mind, is tasked by the High Priest to 'stop Leo Elion's rebellion.'

He was once a promising prince of the kingdom of Elion.
Leo, who has become a prince who dreams of rebellion, proves that the prophecy announcing the ruin is true.

You have to persuade him to stop the war so that the kingdom can be safe. This was the mission of salvation given to the young priestess one day
Will Philia be able to tame this wild beast of a  prince?

altTitles.ja: 金剛番長

description.en: Kongoh Akira is looking to take down the "23 District Project", in which delinquents from the 23 special districts of Tokyo fight for the right to control Japan. Without meaning to, he becomes a participant with the alias "Diamond Delinquent" and must take down other delinquents while searching for the leaders of the project.
description.pt-br: Kongoh Akira está procurando destruir o "Projeto dos 23 Distritos" que envolve os delinquentes dos 23 Special Districts of Tóquio que lutam pelo direito de controlar o Japão. Sem querer, ele se torna um participante com o apelido Diamond Delinquent e deve derrubar outros delinquentes enquanto procura os líderes do projeto.

altTitles.ja: 回復職の悪役令嬢

description.en: Charlotte discovered that she was in the game world she played in her previous life when her engagement was broken off. With her cheat knowledge, she escapes from the scenario and changes her job to a <healer> in the enemy country, and enjoys a free adventurous life!
description.id: Ketika pertunangannya diputus, Charlotte menyadari bahwa dia berada di dunia game yang dia mainkan di kehidupan sebelumnya. Dengan pengetahuan cheatnya, dia melarikan diri dari skenario cerita dan mengubah pekerjaannya menjadi <Penyembuh> di negara musuh, dan menikmati kehidupan petualangan yang bebas!
description.ja: 婚約破棄されたことをきっかけに、ここが前世でプレイしていたゲーム世界だと気づいたシャーロット。チート知識でシナリオ脱出＆敵国で＜癒し手＞にジョブチェンジして、自由な冒険ライフを堪能します！

title.en: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

altTitles.ja: お互いどんどんハマっていく教育係と新入社員

altTitles.ja-ro: Otagai Dondon Hamatteiku Kyouikugakari to Shinnyuushain

That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

altTitles.de: Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

altTitles.ja: 荷物持ちの脳筋無双

description.en:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?
The not-so-normal daily life of twin siblings.

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”  
  
As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
description.es: "Mientras seas el dueño de esa espada y yo una bruja, algún día tendrás que matarme de verdad".    De niño, Óscar, príncipe heredero de Farsas, había sido maldecido a no tener hijos. A los 20 años, visitó a Tinassha, la bruja más fuerte del continente, para romper la maldición. Volvió con Tinassha como protectora, y en el año que le quedaba hasta que expirara su contrato con ella, se vio envuelto en su pasado y en un destino aún mayor.

description.en: This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity, her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too, there's equal parts love and bite.

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.en: I Want To See You Blush

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Star Blossom

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー スターブロッサム

description.en:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.

---

- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)
description.ja: 「挑戦なくして、得られるものなど何もない」　見習いトレーナー・椿が出会ったのは、ガラスの脚を抱えたデビュー前のウマ娘・サクラローレル。半人前の2人が見た頂点への夢は、無謀なのか――。

title.en: My Sister's Best Friend, My Lover.

altTitles.ja: 姉の親友、私の恋人。
Ane no Shinyuu, Watashi no Koibito.

description.en: Sena is a novelist who has been dealing with romantic feelings for her sister, Yuuna. Upon learning that Yuuna is to be married, Yuuna's best friend and former lover Kiku asks Sena to be her lover...

altTitles.ja: テロメア

description.en:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)

title.en: In Another World With My Smartphone

altTitles.fr: Dans un nouveau monde avec mon Smartphone

altTitles.th: ไปต่างโลก! ก็ต้องไปกับสมาร์ทโฟนสิ!!!

altTitles.zh: 带著智慧型手机闯荡异世界
异世界和智能手机在一起

altTitles.ja: 異世界はスマートフォンとともに。

Sang Thế Giới Khác Cùng Với Chiếc Smartphone

altTitles.fr: Un autre monde avec un Smartphone.

altTitles.ar: في عالم أخر مع هاتفي الذكي

altTitles.fa: لە جیھانێکی تر لەگەڵ مۆبایلە زیرەکەکەم (Central Kurdish)

altTitles.zh-hk: 帶著智慧型手機闖蕩異世界。

altTitles.hi: मेरे स्मार्टफोन के साथ दूसरी दुनिया में

description.en: After a freak accident involving some lightning winds up zapping him dead, 15-year-old Mochizuki Touya wakes up to find himself face-to-face with God. "I am afraid to say that I have made a bit of a blunder" laments the old coot. But all is not lost! God says that he can reincarnate Touya into a world of fantasy, and as a bonus, he gets to bring his smartphone along with! So begins Touya's adventure in a new, anachronistic pseudo-medieval world. Friends! Laughs! Tears! Inexplicable Deus ex Machina! He sets off on a journey full of wonder as he absentmindedly travels from place to place, following whatever goal catches his fancy. The curtains lift on an epic tale of swords, sorcery, and smartphone apps!
description.vi:
Mochizuki Touya, 15 tuổi là main giống như bao anh main khác khi đang trên đường về nhà lại bị… sét đánh lăn đùng ra chết :v.Điều đáng nói ở đây là sau khi chết anh main lại bị triệu tập đến trước mặt Thượng đế với lý do: Ổng vô tình… hại chết anh main mà không hay biết. Và để đền bù thì ảnh đã được hồi sinh sang một thế giới song song khác với 1 cái Sì mát phôn (Smartphone :v).
Thừa hưởng trong mình một di sản to lớn về những nền văn minh cổ đại, anh thong dong đi trên con đường đơn độc tại một thế giới khác trong khi sở hữu một nguồn sức mạnh thậm chí có thể giúp anh làm bá chủ của cả thế giới thời bấy giờ.
Càng đi anh càng tạo thêm cho mình nhiều đồng chí quan trọng và trước khi kịp nhận ra… anh đã ngày càng lún sâu vào những bí mật được cất giấu tại thế giới đó…
description.pt-br: Touya Mochizuki foi acidentalmente morto e, como uma desculpa, Deus lhe permite renascer em um mundo de fantasia e lhe concederá qualquer coisa que ele desejar. E assim, Touya escolhe manter seu smartphone no próximo mundo. Em sua segunda chance na vida, ele faz amizade com muitas figuras importantes e se depara com o segredo do mundo. Ele herda o legado de uma civilização antiga e viaja despreocupadamente enquanto possui poderes que rivalizam com os reis daquele mundo.

altTitles.ja: しあわせゴハン

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

altTitles.ja: バディゴ！

description.en: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

description.en: Mashiro is a fangirl of a model named Yuuki. One day, Yuuki transfers to her school and the very first thing she says to him is "I LOVE YOU!" He ignores it as if it is was something normal, and Mashiro repeats it every single day, saying that it isn't enough even to say it everyday. They act like they're a couple although they're not. But will Yuuki's feelings towards Mashiro change?

altTitles.ja: 正体不明と恐怖

description.en: Kaname Isurugi, who suffered facial injuries in an accident, has a hard time getting along with the people at his school ever since he entered. When school counselor Sugata asks Kaname to help solve the problems of the girls in his charge, Kaname half-heartedly makes contact with four of them. After a month passes without any response, Kaname begins to question his actions. Suddenly, Kaname has a shocking "fateful encounter".This is a coming-of-age mystery love comedy by a splendid tag team!

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - Your Shadow Tracen (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: あなたのヤミトレセン学園

description.en: Gag doujinshi made by Bacius featuring characters from Uma Musume Pretty Derby.

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

title.en: Orenchi ni Kita Onna Kishi to Inakagurashi Surukotoninatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 俺んちに来た女騎士と 田舎暮らしすることになった件

altTitles.en: How I Came to Live Out in the Country with a Female Knight Who Showed Up at My Place
The Matter Regarding the Female Knight Who Came to Live With Me in the Countryside
Regarding That We Decided to Live in the Countryside With The Female Knight Who Came to Us

description.en: Saeki Kanji, 32 years old and still single, is living in the Japanese countryside, which is in decline. After graduating from university with a degree in economics he took a job as a salaryman in a leading company in Tokyo, but retired when he inherited the family farm in Mitsuyama village when his parents passed on. He soon took to the life of a simple farmer. One day a beautiful woman wearing full body armor came to his door begging to stay the night. She claimed to be royalty from another world and is unable to return there. She ends up living with Kanji and helping out the local agriculture situation.
description.ja:
とある片田舎で農業を営む佐伯莞爾（32歳）。一人気ままにのんびり田舎暮らしを楽しんでいたら、ある夜とんでもない訪問者が！剣！甲冑！どこからどう見ても「女騎士」…異世界から来たという彼女となりゆきで一緒に暮らすことになったが、前途は多難で…。

---
**Links:**
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.cg-con.com/novel/publication/05_treasure/01_kishi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0388dp)
description.pt:
Saeki Kanji, 32 anos e ainda solteiro, mora em um campo japonês, que está em declínio. Depois de se formar em economia, ele aceitou um emprego como funcionário assalariado em uma empresa líder em Tóquio, mas teve que sair quando herdou a fazenda da família na vila de Miyama quando seus pais morreram e, assim virando um agricultor. Um dia, uma linda mulher vestindo uma armadura de corpo inteiro veio até a porta dela pedindo para passar a noite, ela alegou ser um membro da realeza do outro mundo e não pode voltar para lá, ela acaba vivendo com Kanji e ajudando ele na situação da agricultura local.
  
---

**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuta_yrz)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/air_tansu)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.cg-con.com/novel/publication/05_treasure/01_kishi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0388dp)
description.pt-br: Saeki Kanji, 32 anos e ainda solteiro, mora em um campo japonês, que está em declínio. Depois de se formar em economia, ele aceitou um emprego como funcionário assalariado em uma empresa líder em Tóquio, mas teve que sair quando herdou a fazenda da família na vila de Miyama quando seus pais morreram e, assim virando um agricultor. Um dia, uma linda mulher vestindo uma armadura de corpo inteiro veio até a porta dela pedindo para passar a noite, ela alegou ser um membro da realeza do outro mundo e não pode voltar para lá, ela acaba vivendo com Kanji e ajudando ele na situação da agricultura local.

altTitles.ja: 終末の花嫁様 -sweet home†melty life-

description.en: The Post-Apocalpyse and starting a Newlywed Life with an Angel.
description.id:
"Tolong... Menikahlah denganku!"

Michiru, seorang anak laki-laki yang tidak memiliki "tempat tinggal" baik di rumah maupun di sekolah.
Hikari, onee-san kikuk yang merupakan tetangga dari Michiru.
Sebuah proposal tiba-tiba dibuat.

Setitik cahaya yang muncul di tengah-tengah keseharian yang menyakitkan dan melelahkan.
Di tengah keseharian itu, dunia mengalami kehancuran.

Sebuah keseharian pasutri antara seorang bocah dan malaikat dimulai!

(Sumber sinopsis : Amazon)
description.ja:
「私と…結婚してください！」

家にも学校にも居場所がない少年・みちるは、近所に住むうっかりやのお姉さん・ひかりに突然プロポーズされる。苦しくて、退屈な毎日の中で唯一の光。そんなある日、世界が滅んでしまって――

title.en: I Shaved. Then I Brought a High School Girl Home.

altTitles.es-la: Me afeité la barba. Y luego recogí a una colegiala.

altTitles.ru: Я побрился. Затем привёл старшеклассницу домой.

altTitles.ja: ひげを剃る。そして女子高生を拾う。

altTitles.en: Higehiro: After Being Rejected, I Shaved and Took in a High School Runaway

altTitles.ja-ro: Hige wo Soru. Soshite Joshi Kousei wo Hirou.
Hige Wo Soru. Soshite Joshikosei Wo Hirou.

altTitles.ar: حلقت فجلبت فتاة مدرسة ثانوية إلى المنزل

altTitles.th: โกนหนวดไปทำงาน แล้วกลับบ้านมาพบเธอ

altTitles.zh: 剃须，然后捡到女高中生

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì xū, ránhòu jiǎn dào nǚ gāozhōng shēng

altTitles.ja: ひげひろ

description.en: Yoshida was swiftly rejected by his crush of 5 years. On his way home after drinking his sorrows away, he saw a high school girl sitting on the street. "I'll let you do it with me, so let me stay". "Don't even joke about something like that". And so, the story of living with the high school girl Sayu began. The slice-of-life romance story between a runaway high school girl and a 26 year old salaryman ensues.
description.es: Yoshida fue rápidamente rechazado por su amor de 5 años. En su camino a casa después de consumir sus penas, vio a una chica de secundaria sentada en la calle. "Te dejaré hacerlo conmigo, así que déjame quedarme". "No bromees con algo así". Y así comenzó la historia sobre la convivencia con la chica de secundaria, Sayu. La romántica historia de la vida entre una colegiala fugitiva y un asalariado de 26 años comienza.
description.fr: Après l’avoir aimée pendant cinq ans, Yoshida est rejeté par sa supérieure. En rentrant chez lui après avoir bu pour oublier sa tristesse, il tombe sur une lycéenne assise par terre. « Je te laisserai le faire avec moi, si tu me laisses rester chez toi. » « Ne dis pas des choses comme ça, même pour plaisanter. » C’est ainsi que commence l’histoire de Sayu la lycéenne fugueuse avec Yoshida, un employé banal de 26 ans.
description.ru: Йошиду поспешно отвергла девушка, в которую он был влюблён 5 лет. Утопив своё горе в алкоголе, по дороге домой он встречает старшеклассницу на улице. "Я разрешу вам сделать это со мной, так что позвольте мне остаться у вас". "Даже шутить не смей о чём-то подобном". Так и началась эта история про жизнь с старшеклассницей Саю. Повседневная романтическая комедия между сбежавшей из дома старшеклассницей и 26-летним служащим.
description.pt-br: Desolado e bêbado, Yoshida, um empregado de 26 anos, deparou-se com uma estudante do ensino médio que havia saído de casa quando voltou do bar. "Ei você. JK O que diabos você está fazendo aqui? Vá para casa agora. "Tio, me deixe ficar em sua casa esta noite. Você podemos fazer "isso" se me deixar ficar." "Se você disse em tom de brincadeira, não é engraçado." "Não estou brincando. Está tudo bem por mim." "Então deixe-me dizer-lhe, não tenho interesse em pirralhas." "Hmm? Então, apenas me deixe ficar".

title.en: A Story About Getting a Haircut After Hearing Your Crush Prefers Short Hair

altTitles.ja: 好きな人がショートカット好きと知って髪切る話

altTitles.en: Cutting Her Hair After Finding out That the Person She Likes, Likes Short Cuts

altTitles.vi: Cắt tóc sau khi biết gu cậu bạn mình thầm thích là tóc ngắn

altTitles.ja-ro: Suki na Hito ga Short-cut Suki to Shitte Kami Kiru Hanashi
Sukina Hito ga Sho-tokattosuki to Shitte Kami Kiru Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: Una historia sobre cortarse el pelo después de oír que su crush prefiere el pelo corto.

altTitles.id: Potong Rambut Setelah Tau Kalau Mas Crush Bilang Suka Rambut Pendek

altTitles.vi: 割𩯀婁欺別所慼倘伴命啿慼羅𩯀短 (Nom Script)

altTitles.pl: Historia o tym jak obcięłam włosy po tym jak usłyszałam, że ten, kto mi się podoba preferuje krótkie włosy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre cortar o cabelo depois de descobrir que a pessoa que você gosta gosta de cortes curtos

altTitles.uk: Підстриглася після того, як дізналася, що коханий полюбляє короткі стрижки

altTitles.id: Potong Rambut Karena Mas Crush Bilang Suka Rambut Pendek

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/114158543)

altTitles.ja: いとなみいとなめず

altTitles.en: For Your Sake, I’ll Never Leave Your Side

description.en: They haven't done anything yet - A story about a serious, simple, unadorned young man who wears nothing but the purest of clothes, never dreaming that he would fall in love . Until he meets a fragile girl working at a bento shop one day. This is a story about how a man and a woman who have never been in a romantic relationship before , start their newlywed life.
description.ja: 単行本1巻発売前から大反響＆大人気!!ほっこり＆むずキュン必至、直視できないほどの純情ラブ！二人はまだ何もシた事がない――真面目で朴訥、純情が服を着歩いているような青年は、“自分なんか”が恋に落ちるなど夢にも思っていなかった。あの日、弁当屋で働く儚げな少女に出会うまでは…。これは、清く澄みきった交際経験ナシの男女が、色々すっ飛ばして結婚生活＜いとなみ＞を始めるお話。

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: 初恋と茜空

description.en: Hitomi moved to the countryside, and is bored, in comparison to her former busy life in Tokyo. However, that changes when she meets a certain boy…

altTitles.ja: ハレ婚。おかわり！

description.en: Cumulative total of over 2.6 million copies & drama! A shocking work depicting polygamy"Hare Kon" is back!

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: 高嶺の華は乱れ咲き

description.en: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends… He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!

altTitles.ja: はたらく魔王さま!

description.en: After being soundly thrashed by the hero Emilia, the Devil King and his general beat a hasty retreat to a parallel universe… only to land plop in the middle of bustling, modern-day Tokyo! Lacking the magic necessary to return home, the two are forced to assume human identities and live average human lives until they can find a better solution. And to make ends meet, Satan finds gainful employment at a nearby fast food joint! With his devilish mind set on working his way up the management food chain, what will become of his thirst for conquest?
description.ja: 勇者に敗れ異世界へ撤退した魔王サタンと腹心のアルシエルがたどり着いたのは、魔王をして常識を超えた超高度文明の世界、ずばり東京都渋谷区笹塚だった。この世界では魔王といえどお金がなければなにもできない。元の世界エンテ・イスラへ帰る力をたくわえるため、魔王改め真奥貞夫は、今日も幡ヶ谷駅前のマグドでアルバイトに励むっ！

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

title.en: Monmusugo! ~Honnyaku Skill de Saikyou Monmusume to Isekai Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: モンむすご！〜翻訳スキルで最強モン娘と異世界生活〜

altTitles.en: Monmusugo!: Living in Another World with the Strongest Monster Girls with Translation Skills

description.en: Amakawa Keisuke, a hapless corporate slave who suddenly dies, wakes up in a different world! He tries his best to enjoy life in another world, but he has only been given the bottom-tier skill "Translation" and on top of that, the most powerful monster was in front of him...!
description.ja: 突然死した社畜サラリーマン・天川慶介が目を覚ますとそこは異世界！　異世界ライフを謳歌しようと頑張るが、ゴミスキル「翻訳」しか授かってなかった上に、目の前には最強のモンスターが…!?

altTitles.ja: 明日ちゃんのセーラー服

description.en: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
description.es:
Akebi Komichi vive en una zona rural con su familia y acaba de conseguir entrar en la famosa Academia de secundaria Roubai, a la que ya asistió su madre. Como ella, le gustaría llevar el clásico uniforme de marinero, que ya no es el habitual en la Academia.

Después de conseguir que le permitan llevar su ansiado uniforme cosido por su madre, Akebi empezará su vida en secundaria con el objetivo de hacer muchas amigas. El paso tranquilo del tiempo, la inocencia y la naturalidad, marcarán la vida de Akebi y sus amigas.
description.es-la: El escenario es la Academia Privada Roubai, una prestigiosa escuela secundaria femenina del país. Para Akebi Komichi, ponerse el uniforme de marinera de esta escuela es un sueño hecho realidad. Su vida de ensueño en la escuela secundaria por fin comienza. Las verdes vistas del campo abierto. El lento fluir del tiempo de la juventud. Con un suave toque, el genial artista Hiro te trae este sencillo cuento escolar... ¡ahora se matricula!
description.pt-br:
A história se passa na prestigiosa Academia Roubai, uma escola secundária para garotas, no Japão. 

Nossa amável Akebi Komichi, a protagonista, entrou na academia com o sonho de vestir o lindo uniforme Sailor, porém, ela se surpreende no seu primeiro dia. O que será que aconteceu? Akebi ainda viverá muitas experiências em Roubai até se tornar uma idol como sua cantora favorita Miki-chan! Avante Akebi!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.ja: 宇宙ファラオ☆パトラちゃん

description.en:
Let's invade Earth during summer vacation!?

I, Princess Patra of Ptolemy, chose "Earth Invasion" for my summer vacation free study!
However, because of my comfortable life on Earth, I tend to fall behind on my homework!
Today is another peaceful day♪ (Thanks to Patra-chan's love for the Earth)

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

title.en: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples

altTitles.en: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened

altTitles.pt-br: Lições após a escola para maçãs não maduras

description.en:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
description.fr: Octobre 1998, Mi-Ae est juste une collégienne normale qui fait de son mieux pour mener une vie relativement tranquille à l'école. Elle aime lire des bandes dessinées, écouter le groupe pop «The Fire Boys», et faire du karaoké. Un jour, un garçon qu'elle connaissait est transféré dans son école et commence à causer des problèmes. Sauf que peu importe ce qu'elle fait, il semblerait qu'il n'apprécie pas les efforts de Mi-Ae pour apprendre à mieux le connaître. Ça veut dire quoi au juste ?!

description.en:
During the mid-19th century in Prussia, Dr. Maria Faust, known as the 'Witch of Könihilsberg' who made a pact with the devil Mephistopheles, meets Martin, a curious young man who dreams of becoming a novelist, while on a journey to find 'a way to bring the dead back to life'. . 

Faust is once knocked down by the villain Valentin, who was hostile to him, but rises again with the help of Martin, who admires her, and his student Wagner.

After that, Faust finds the truth he has been looking for, but he also realizes his mistakes... In the end, Faust finally feels the joy of life by saving the dying.

Was she really a witch?
description.ko: 19세기 중반 프로이센, 악마 메피스토펠레스와 계약한 ‘쾨니힐스베르크의 마녀’라 불리는 마리야 파우스트 박사는 ‘죽은 사람을 살릴 수 있는 방법’을 찾기 위한 여행길 도중 소설가를 꿈꾸는 호기심 많은 청년 마르틴과 만나게 된다. 파우스트는 그를 적대시하던 악인 발렌틴에 의해 한 차례 무너지지만, 그녀를 흠모하는 마르틴과 제자 바그너의 도움으로 다시 일어선다. 온갖 일들 끝에 파우스트는 그토록 찾던 진리를 찾지만, 자신의 잘못 또한 깨닫는데… 결국 죽어가는 이들을 살리면서 마침내 삶의 환희를 느끼게 된 파우스트. 그녀는 과연 마녀였을까?

description.en: 『Sometimes, your future gets decided by just one moment.』    The whole kingdom of Jesús fell into a state of shock after hearing the news of Queen Mary Trizia’s Suicide.    While everyone praised Mary Trizia for being an excellent queen, whilst her older twin brother, Rafael Evans, was most suspicious of her death.    ‘It can only be you. No one else can save me other than you.’     These words and the image of his sister screaming those words while approaching him bare-footed remained in his head. Rafael ventures out in search after his relatives for the first time in his life, to attend Mary’s funeral.    But in the place where they found Mary’s body, Rafael finds a note…    “Lift up your face.”  Wanting to find the killer of Mary, Rafael disguises himself as the new queen consort, Anne-Mary La Shore and meets the king ‘Ivry.’    That moment marked the start of an unprecedented fate.  The unexpected end of his sister who wasn’t like her younger self, and who he believed would find happiness…    What was the ‘hell’ that his sister dropped into?  And what will change after Rafael and Ivry meet?
